website_summaries.verdict: Players needing a full replacement set or additional controllers for the Wii U won’t be disappointed with this nicely priced set.
pros: Controllers pair quickly and easily with Wii U and Wii systems
Ergonomic design matches that of the original controllers
Button and stick responsiveness is very good
Silicone protective case helps prolong controllers’ service life
cons: Nunchuk joystick vibration can be bothersome
Pointer tends to be too sensitive, leading to inaccuracy

customer_reviews.title: Work well..
customer_reviews.text: These work as good as the originals we replaced with these. I was actually going to order 2 more, BUT Nintendo is NOT going to support Netflix on our Wii anymore, so I am not going to buy them because we will no longer be using our Wii for streaming. I WOULD order these again if I had a need for them though!
customer_reviews.author: WiseCrew

customer_reviews.title: High quality for a an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: At first I was very skeptic about them because I had bad experience with generic controllers. I tasted at a Wii and a Wii U and it worked better than I spected. The only things that bothers me is the strong vibration and the edge of the nunchuck stick. But considering the price compared with original and used controllers you find online, this is totally worth it. I will update this review if it starts to malfunction, but I hope that's not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo A

customer_reviews.title: Good value for Wii controller
customer_reviews.text: I ordered blue one for my nephew's Wii, he just used it today and he liked it. It synced quickly with no issue. It's great value compare to other controllers you find in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Lin L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has CP and can only use one had She loves it it's small enough and easy for her to use plus the color matched her game system
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Slight Defect
customer_reviews.text: The Poulep Wii controllers worked well for few days, then started having problem with controller number selection. Still usable, but I am concerned about long-term reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Boudreault

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Both the controllers were terrible. The blue audio cuts out and sometimes doesn't register the controls, and the black one wouldn't connect at all. I wish I had tried them earlier because by the time I did I passed the return deadline. Wish I could get my money back for it because they are unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Clark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect inexpensive replacement
customer_reviews.text: These are a perfect replacement for our current Wii controllers that went bad. The quality is better than what we got with our original Wii and if we ever need to replace ours I will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Sun Devils Fan

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk, couldn’t get either one of them to read right through the Wii, so there fore I couldn’t give a rating for battery life, material quality? It’s a pretty decent made pos, I love shopping on Amazon and I have bought a lot of cut rate stuff from China because it was cheap, keyword CHEAP, sometimes I’ve been able to overcome and make it work (most times not) but usually for the money IF it works right for any amount of time, it is worth it because US companies over charge for goods and their track record can be sketchy also. (Just trying to give a fair assessment).
customer_reviews.author: Telecat

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GAME CONTROLLERS
customer_reviews.text: These controllers work perfectly with our older Nintendo Wii system. We already had two game controllers but wanted to play tennis doubles (four players) and four player bowling over the holidays. These two extra controllers enabled everyone to participate and enjoy the Nintendo Wii system. Also like the color selection - chose black and dark blue to distinguish them from the original two controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Aware Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great controllers better than wii ones cause they come with accessories and great colors
customer_reviews.text: The controllers work great, now this is only day one so I will update if they change. The color options are great, and the fact they come with a little bumper case is nice as well . They work just the same as the actual wii controllers , I would say these are def worth the purchase and my son loves that he can lick between the colors for his dif moods lol.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: The product is what I wanted. Nothing special or bad about them.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Works with the wii, looks great, comes with grips.
customer_reviews.text: These synced up with the wii perfectly and worked just fine. Haven't tried out the nunchuck yet, but motion detection was great, seems to be a great value. I purchased rechargeable batteries for them, and I only put batteries in to try them out then put them away. Will be giving the wii as a gift later. If they prove to be terrible in the long run I'll come back and update. If no update, then assume I'm too busy enjoying them to hate on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jamin V.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: They work fine so far only had them a day I only gave one star for the simple fact is I ordered the light blue and red controller and what came was two light blue controllers and a red and and light blue numchuck. So the pack just was not paying attention is my guess I tried to use the scan code to get this resulted and it just tells me it's an invalid code. Kind of sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Vaine

customer_reviews.title: Seems a little off from original Wii controllers
customer_reviews.text: Does the work as expected. Both the wii controller and the nunchuck. It has a little bit of a motion delay when playing mario kart and sometimes it seems to be overwhelming, hoping that this delay is not casued by 4 remotes connected but the original ones seem to work better. 4 star for thos few mario kart games I lost, otherwise, its a really good buy
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality product. Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t even had these controllers a week and already one is broken. When they do work, The reaction time from pushing button to your character doing what you want is delayed. And sometimes the cursor doesn’t work when you first turn on the console. You have to back up to the back of the room to figure out where it is, and even then, you’re lucky if you can get it to work innunder 10 minutes
customer_reviews.author: toons2183

customer_reviews.title: Fine, but a tad haunted
customer_reviews.text: As a family of six currently quarantined in our two bedroom house, any Wii remote is better than no Wii remote. We call the blue one “the evil remote” because it will suddenly send your kart off to the right, making rainbow road a laughable endeavor. Once I fully stopped on the edge of rainbow road and Yoshi slowly turned around and jumped off as we watched. It also sometimes wants to pop out of the wheel holder so when you try to drift in a turn nothing happens. But for a cheap 2-pack it’s perfectly acceptable and at least we are racing each other.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Colwell

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: Update: had the remote only for a month and we are having issues now, especially with the nunchuk. The nunchuk doesnt move characters in all directions. We have only used the nunchuck, as it is a second one, no more than 5 times too. Works fine, grip is thinnner than original controllers, but it is cheaper so I dont mind. Synchronized no problem. Took a minute though, but that was on my end since I had forgot to push the sync button on our wii, not just the remote. Once I did though it synced immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hofer

customer_reviews.title: Issues with movement. Not a good replacement.
customer_reviews.text: They connect to the wii without issue, but their accuracy and movement is pretty bad. I had to send one back as it wouldn't respond to movement to the left. The replacement had the same issue after a few months. I wouldn't buy these again. For games that don't use movement, or need a lot of movement they're fine. For games like wii sports I've ended up just using the single original controller I still have. I wouldn't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Barrett

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE!
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are garbage on both, one of the remotes looks like you're having a seizure when holding it, and one of the joystick controllers doesn't sense motion, and the other one of the buttons doesn't work. Very unsatisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: jesse tudahl

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: This was great at first... two months past and now the blue controller is going to have to be trashed. The vibration is so loud I can’t hear my TV, the joystick is stuck so it’s always falling and dragging to one corner, and even the nunchuck used with one of my other controllers has the same joystick issues. I was really excited but it just didn’t work out. I’d comment on the red one but I can’t find it right now...
customer_reviews.author: CoreyChristina Otto

customer_reviews.title: Ugh...should have gotten the real wii controller
customer_reviews.text: I got there for a wii that was given to us with no controls. These shut off all the time on their own. The motion is also very glitchy. Ill be getting the real wii remotes. You get what you pay for i guess
customer_reviews.author: Mm3rica

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended !
customer_reviews.text: The product look the same as the Wii remotes. It also works well for the wii. Each player are able to distinguish which remote is theirs. The remote covers also come with it and the attachment part too. When you get the remotes check the battery compartment because mine had a little corrosion. Just wipe it out with a little rubbing alcohol and let it dry overnight. This product is a great solution to the problem of not having enough remotes for the family.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Already broken
customer_reviews.text: We have had these for less than a month; one of them doesn't work at all anymore, the other only works sometimes. When they were fully operational, they were slower to respond than the actual Wii remotes. I would not purchase these if you are looking for replacement or extra remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Batteries needed taped in, still good value.
customer_reviews.text: We had to tape the batteries in one because the contact bracket is off center, so moving the wiimote would shake one of the batteries loose and the controller would turn off. Also, these do not have the wii motion plus, which, apparently, makes a big difference. Still a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Remotes wont work...
customer_reviews.text: The remotes never worked. No one knew how to connect the.remotes .if u can help me to activate the remotes i would love to keep them.they were a gift to my grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: toliver

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money!
customer_reviews.text: While the price of this one is far less money than the official Nintendo ones, you wind up spending the difference in batteries. Also, after 4 months it’s starting to shutdown for no reason even when it has brand new batteries. It has frustrated my 6 year old. The cursor on the screen is very shaky even when you’re holding your hand steady. Not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Never worked for us.
customer_reviews.text: We had to send these back. They wouldn't connect at first and then even when we got them connected they kept disconnecting. You couldnt play for more than a min at a time.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Ray III

customer_reviews.title: DOESNT DETECT BATTERIES/DOESNT HOLD CHARGE
customer_reviews.text: $37 dollars for 2 controllers, 2 sleeves, and 2 nunchucks, great price for the quality! If you want a controller that cant detect when batteries are plugged into it this is the right item for you!! Tried my rechargeable AAs, no good. Tried normal AAs, nothing. Grabbed my old rechargeable battery packs with docking station, NOTHING. The only thing that did work was my TV remote batteries, and it burned them out in 2 hours. Very unfortunate, BUT, wasnt too much of an issue to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Find Something Else
customer_reviews.text: Remotes never stayed connected to wii system. Battery life was terrible. We sent ours back within 2 weeks. DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Fugitt

customer_reviews.title: Delayed functions, buttons and movements
customer_reviews.text: Look neat to begin with but poor movement syncing. Both remotes were very delayed when using with games on the Wii. Couldnt continue to play with such a delay so we have requested a return.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Could not get them to connect
customer_reviews.text: I tried for probably half an hour to get these to connect to my Wii. I would get one to connect finally after removing batteries and replacing batteries and trying to sync them to my Wii and then am unable to get any others to connect after that without them all disconnecting! Very sad!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Ok replacement but the Wii OEM style is better
customer_reviews.text: These work fine, especially as spare controllers. The vibration has a tinny sound and feel and the response isn't as good as the OEM Wii controller though.
customer_reviews.author: C. Keebler

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I mean, they work, that’s about it. Definitely not genuine. weird feel, and they are just kind of off vibrate weird glow to much don’t like to work with the motion
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: These remotes are junk. This is the second time I have bought these in hopes before I just got a bad set. Well I did for both times I ordered them. I highly recommend staying away from these.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Do not work correctly
customer_reviews.text: These knock offs do not work correctly. They caused everything to go to one side and messed up the players game. Spend the extra money and get name brand.
customer_reviews.author: H. Rooks

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Ordered because Wii only came with 1 controller and need nunchucks to play additional games. Arrived on time. Good condition. Work great.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna H

customer_reviews.title: One of the controllers isn’t working
customer_reviews.text: The pink controller works great. We have put new batteries into the the blue controller multiple times and the controller will work for a few minutes and then stop. In order to get it to work again we have to take the batteries out and put them back in, only for the controller to stop working again in a few more minutes (mid-game). At this point the controller isn’t working at all. Pink one is fine just would’ve liked for two ppl to play at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Monica K.

customer_reviews.title: Work perfectly with my wii
customer_reviews.text: The controllers work with my wii and are good quality. The covers for the controllers are ok but not as good as the ones you get with original controllers. Connected easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: No complaints - works just fine with my sons Wii U
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: Within a few weeks these remotes stopped working well. The nunchucks do not work properly and buttons only work when they want to.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C. Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had one blue remote that didn't work that isn't even detected on the screen and the opposite black nun Chuck that didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: cara attebery

customer_reviews.title: Great addition or replacement!
customer_reviews.text: Synced perfect and different colors kept confusion and fights over controllers by the kids to a minimum. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua F.

customer_reviews.title: Only works if you're within 4 feet of the sensor bar
customer_reviews.text: I tried these controllers with 3 different sensor bars and they only work if you're within about 4 feet of the sensor bar and even then the pointer jumps all over the screen
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Gesture control does not mean motion control.
customer_reviews.text: Gesture control does not mean motion control. You will still need an adapter for these controllers. They also seem to be a bit more difficult to sync. Other than that...meh. They are ok.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: They work very well but sometimes the motion sensor is a little off, I bought these to replace my dying, 13 year old remotes, they were very easy to sync with the Wii, but the motion sensor doesn’t work occasionally. I’ve checked to make sure it’s not my sensor bar and it’s not. Great value though.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Back on my Wii life
customer_reviews.text: These work wonderfully. I recently moved and we somehow lost my controllers, I was so bummed until I found these. Now we can play games for so long and feel great about it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz W

customer_reviews.title: Work as they should
customer_reviews.text: The colors help my children keep their own controllers, and it helps them to be responsible for the care of them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Off brand
customer_reviews.text: Off brand garbage. Doesnt work nearly as good at the nintendo remotes. Constantly glitching.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Abner

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible! They sync but then when you load a game to play, it asks to connect the controllers! 🙄 Missed the return window! Just purchased a $35 dust collector. Do not buy this! Buy yourself dinner instead!
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Buttons doesn’t react all the time
customer_reviews.text: The wii remote looks like a Nintendo wii remote. The D-pad doesn’t react 50% of the time when it is clicked.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Work perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: These remotes are great! We had no issues with them and the kids have been using them regularly for a good month now. The only problem we have is who gets the red and who gets the blue.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Meegan

customer_reviews.title: Blue one works very well;  black one never shuts off, uses new batteries every 2 days!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I set up both of the controllers today, and found they work better than the original WII controllers. They are more exacting...got ten strikes in a row first time bowling. Also, the sounds are more distinct. I AM NOT SO HAPPY, BECAUSE ONLY ONE WORKS WELL. THE SECOND NEVER SHUTS OFF AND GOES THRU 2 BATTERIES EVERY 48 HOURS. Too bad the company does not have any QUALITY CONTROL...!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Bartz

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to use
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty difficult to handle with accuracy. Not unusable on every game, but definitely unusable on some.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Willis

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Will not properly connect to wii. Has a delay function. Would spend more money on quality remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: It’s not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have had these controllers for about a month now, and after a months usage they are horrible. The input lag it bad, and motion control is detected 50% of the time, just buy an original.
customer_reviews.author: Lissethdzm

customer_reviews.title: They kind of work
customer_reviews.text: They pretty much work. Very finicky though with remote disconnecting. They got worse after attacking a motion plus attachment.
customer_reviews.author: T. Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Drip too hard
customer_reviews.text: For anyone who just found their wii in their closets and was like “ohhhh snap imma bust this mug out” and wants to order a remote, you’re in the right place my brethren, this controller slaps, and it and with the grip boys!!!!
customer_reviews.author: 🤯

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for extra players on our sons wii. They worked fine for a little while but after a couple months we started noticing problems with the joystick and not being able to control character movement. Now neither remote works at all. Don’t buy these unless you want to buy more in 3-6 months
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible with some game, motion detection sometimes is slow, wire pulled out of the nunchuk after one use.
customer_reviews.author: M. G.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: These remote hooked up right away when we first used them. However they wouldn’t stay connected. Now they wont even connect at all. I even tried resetting all the remotes and it still wont work. And now I’m past the return window and have two remotes I can no longer use.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Kinda disappointed with the pink one the buttons don't respond timely however the blue one works perfectly so.....
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Buttons insensitive after few days of use
customer_reviews.text: The buttons did not pop up after a few days of use, poor quality product.
customer_reviews.author: pnw

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product!!! Great price then anyone or place I looked. My daughter loves them worked and connected with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Motion detection is okay. Battery life lasts a lot longer than the original.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great for different colored Wii remotes and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Kenzy Koo

customer_reviews.title: Kinda shit kinda ehh
customer_reviews.text: Kinda alright I’ve had for a week about and had to replace the battery’s 3 times already and the black nunchuck came with the red wire not connected and it didn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Jon Norcross

customer_reviews.title: Motion detection was off
customer_reviews.text: The motion detection is not good at all. I dont know if I got some that were bad but I need to exchange
customer_reviews.author: OBX2MTNLOVERS

customer_reviews.title: Not a good controller
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and keeps cutting out. And it sounds funny when it vibrates. Very disappointed in this controller
customer_reviews.author: mkg206

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: We loved the bright colors! They work really well and my children love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very intense vibration
customer_reviews.text: These don't seem to be official Wii controllers but there was no problem getting them to connect. The kids were playing Super Mario Bros and the vibrating feedback was more intense than the standard Wii controller and wouldn't be ideal for a kid with sensitivities to touch. Overall, we were satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sands

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I can't even imagine what is going on with these remotes! I am changing the batteries daily! That just isn't normal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: They're ok. Had a syncing issue at first. Then it worked. Batteries seem to drain faster. But the kids love them and they work well
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Stop now. Buy name brand.
customer_reviews.text: Glitchy and kept disconnecting. Spend the extra money for the Nintendo brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great with Wii
customer_reviews.text: These work great with our wii!! We needed 2 new remotes for our wii and these were a good price, so far they work great.
customer_reviews.author: melissa a

customer_reviews.title: Sensor Issues with Driving Games
customer_reviews.text: While playing mario kart (most common Wii game for my family) with these controllers the car randomly veers to the side and crashes into walls like crazy. I've even tried resyncing the controllers and adjusting the sensitivity with no luck. Seems to work fine for Wii sports.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Ver
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for the game system. Works great. Now two people can play at once.
customer_reviews.author: Cyvilla

customer_reviews.title: Nice controller
customer_reviews.text: We needed another controller so that my grandchildren and I can play the Wii all together and this fit the bill for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money..
customer_reviews.text: The remote worked fine initially, within 2 hours the speaker started blurring and popping. The nunchunk won't work at all. Trouble shooted as much as possible... sending them back 3 hours after receiving them!!
customer_reviews.author: AlwysShopping

customer_reviews.title: Controllers in different colors solved a big problem
customer_reviews.text: Needed these for grandkids and our Wii so they stopped having to share. Love the colors.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kozarek

customer_reviews.title: Great price and good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I can't give 5 stars as we've not had it long enough to decide but I was very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica V Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Bought 4and they were Hard to connect/ some didn’t connect at all. Motion sensors are off even after trying to calibrate
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA H.

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Loved the colors and they arrived early! After using them for awhile realize they don't work as well as the originals.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: I was under the assumption I would be getting two so I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this is common or not, but mine arrived with only the red controller and nunchuck. I was under the assumption I would be getting two so I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: My son ask for these for Christmas, but the remote and nunchuck did not work with the Wii system. He was bummed and I got busy and now it's too late to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Thuy James

customer_reviews.title: Needed new nunchucks 5 months after purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Occasionally glitched and then the nunchucks stopped working 5 months later.
customer_reviews.author: PainterMama

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot for the price, however, one of the remote doesn't even work. Everything is made of cheap plastic and is not very nice. I wouldn't recommend this, but if you're on a budget, it's alright.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden D

customer_reviews.title: No motion plus included but you can buy it separately
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint would be the lack of Wii motion plus that is included in the traditional wii remotes but that's to be expected when it costs so much less. My kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: Aida Blackhall

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: They're definitely cheaply made. The plastic feels super cheap. They wont stay connected to the wii. They shut off randomly. It almost seems that the batteries dont fully stay inside the remote when being used.
customer_reviews.author: Alexys

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly - the reach is actually stronger than our Nintendo brand controller.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Crap, the first ones where sent back due to the nunchucks not working right and now the second set is doing the same. Spend the extra money and get the right ones for your system.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these two weeks ago and one has already stopped working. I changed the batteries and they seem to turn on fine but will not connect to my Wii no matter how many times I try to sync it. Very disappointed with this purchase and will not buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great equipment
customer_reviews.text: They have worked very well. Fits great in the hand and works just like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Donita H.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchsse.
customer_reviews.text: They don't hold charge very long, but overall, at least they work.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Leibee

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pair of remotes to round out our old Wii set. What terrible remotes, brand new batteries died after an hour of use, the motion sensors would get stuck and make driving in Mario Kart a complete nightmare. I've returned these remotes in hopes of finding better ones elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon_B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value!
customer_reviews.text: These work great for being an off brand. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LeesaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: For the price I pay it's a great remote. My kids are using this remotes
customer_reviews.author: John Marrero Perez

customer_reviews.title: not as sensitive as original wii remotes
customer_reviews.text: the sensor doesn't seem to pick up the movements as well with these controllers as they do with our two original ones from when the wii was originally purchased. for games that do not require a sensitive connection to handle the movements, the controllers work great.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like the controllers very cute. Took me a minute to figure out how to connect them though.
customer_reviews.author: brianna

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: i didn’t want to buy a wii remote because they’re so expensive but this off brand remote is so crappy i just might do so. the motion sensor is wack and won’t pick up when playing a game, and the battery dies very fast
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Will not connect/link up with console
customer_reviews.text: We tried for over 30 minutes to get the remotes linked up to the console without success. Will purchase actual Wii remotes next even though they are more money (but honestly, not much more). You get what you pay for with knockoffs.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Durny

product_meta.title: Poulep 2 Packs Nunchuck and Remote Controller for Wii Wii U Console - Black and Deep Blue
product_meta.description:
Color:Black and Deep Blue

 It is Poulep Brand Product,Only Compatible For Wii.

A new product of high quality.

Equipped with high-quality silicone case and durable wrist strap. 

Requires 2 AA batteries or wii remote battery.

Control distance: Approx. 5m 

Cable length of wired nunchunk: 100cm

Size of remote controller: 15*4*3cm

Package weight: 255g

Package includes:

2 * nunchuck controller

2 * remote controller

2 * silicone case

2 * wrist strap 

1 * white box

NOTE: this item is without motion plus in lower cost,if you prefer remote motion plus option, please visit our store to buy another item.
feature_bullets: COMPATILITY - It is Poulep Brand Product,Only Compatible For Wii.
Using these game controllers can make the game more enjoyable and more realistic. Compatible with any wii game and most wii u games.(Note:no motion plus function.)
Ergonomic design - has a great grip experience, free and comfortable.
Requires 2 AAA batteries or wii remote battery (Batteries not included).
CUSTOMER SERVICE - Any query,please feel free to contact us at the first time.We will ALWAYS replace a faulty product or refund your purchase within 45 days.
